short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cisco Voicemail for Gmail provides a visual interface for an enriched experience with voicemails at Gmail.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description : With this extension, you can now perform the following :
~ Compose a voicemail from within Gmail
~ Play the received voicemail without the need of any external player
~ Compose a voicemail in reply-to a received message
~ Compose a voicemail while forwarding a received message

For details, please refer to: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/connection/vmg/quick_start/guide/b_cucqsvmgchrext.html
